thread.title: Tottenham join Chelsea, Everton and Southampton in £15m race for Hull defender Harry Maguire
thread.title_full: Tottenham join Chelsea, Everton and Southampton in £15m race for Hull defender Harry Maguire

author: leeastley
title: Tottenham join Chelsea, Everton and Southampton in £15m race for Hull defender Harry Maguire
text:
Prince Harry Tottenham join Chelsea, Everton and Southampton in £15m race for Hull defender Harry Maguire 
The centre-back has been on fine form this season and is looking increasingly likely to leave the KCOM Stadium in the summer Gossip Comments TOTTENHAM have entered the race for £15million-rated Hull defender Harry Maguire, according to reports. 
Premier League clubs Southampton and Everton are already looking at the centre-back who has been on fine form this season. Getty Images Harry Maguire is now being targeted by Tottenham as well as Chelsea Southampton and Everton Hull 2-0 Liverpool : Bottom-of-the-table Tigers stun drab Reds as Jurgen Klopp’s horror 2017 continues 
The Daily Star are now reporting that Spurs are now also interested in Maguire, 23, with Chelsea also sniffing around the player. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Tottenham news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Mauricio Pochettino is looking at defensive options for his team after injuries to Toby Alderweireld and Jan Vertonghen while there are doubts surrounding Kevin Wimmer's White Hart Lane future. 
And Maguire is a prime target as he is a versatile defender who can play in a back three or four. Reuters Harry Maguire has been valued at £15million by Hull as clubs cue up for his signature AP:Associated Press 4 Harry Maguire was praised for his immense performance against Chelsea earlier in the season 
But Hull will try desperately to hold on to their star man in the summer if they avoid relegation to the Championship. related stories Hull-bent on survival Harry Maguire excited for Arsenal clash as Hull continue to stick two fingers up to critics Another pinch West Ham set to raid Hull again with £9million Harry Maguire bid... after already snatching Robert Snodgrass FOOTBALL WHISPERS Harry Maguire the man to help Hull escape relegation - if the talented defender remains at the club TIGER FEAT Harry Maguire to turn down new Hull deal amid interest from Southampton and Everton I'LL HIRE MAGUIRE Middlesbrough plot return raid to finally land Hull City £6m defender Harry Maguire Reuters Harry Maguire joined Hull for just £3million from Sheffield United in 2014 Arsenal 2-0 Hull : Alexis Sanchez brace secures the points for Arsenal
